comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Albert Henry George Grey, the 4th Earl Grey, 1851-1917, Governor General of Canada: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_Grey,_4th_Earl_Grey

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The tea is actually named after the 2nd Earl Grey, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Grey,_2nd_Earl_Grey , Prime Minister of the UK in the 1830s. Albert (seen above) was the nephew of the 3rd Earl Grey, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Grey,_3rd_Earl_Grey who had no children.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca:

Thank you for the more complete name of this gentleman. We will expand the description when we update this record.
